arts.ttl: Monza bid farewell away to AC Milan
arts.sum: The two Serie A matches played at the San Siro between Milan and Monza have been won by the Rossoneri by an aggregate score of 7-1; only against Atalanta (10) and Roma (8) have the Brianzoli conceded more away goals in the top-flight. There have been no draws between Milan and Monza in their five Serie A meetings, with the Rossoneri claiming four wins and suffering one defeat to the Brianzoli; these five matches have also had an average of 3.2 goals scored per game.
